terrapeer.vui.j3dui.manipulate
Class BoxOutline

java.lang.Object
  javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      javax.media.j3d.Node
          javax.media.j3d.Group
              terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.elements.TextureShape
                  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.manipulate.BoxOutline
public class BoxOutline
extends TextureShape

Creates a box outline (wireframe bounding box) texture shape (see TextureShape). A "margin" can be specified so that the outline is offset from around the object that it is bounding.

The texture is wrapped around the outline with the left vertical edge of the texture image corresponding to the (-X, -Y) box edge, continuing around to the (-X, +Z) edge, and ending with the right image edge back at the (-X, -Z) box edge.

See Also:
TextureShape

Constructor Detail

BoxOutline

public BoxOutline(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                  javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                  double margin)
Constructs a BoxOutline with the specified attributes. By default the object will not be pickable, will be default colored, will not be transparent, and will not be textured.

BoxOutline

public BoxOutline(boolean pickable,
                  javax.vecmath.Color3f color,
                  double trans,
                  java.lang.String texPath,
                  javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                  javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                  double margin)
Constructs a BoxOutline with the specified attributes.

Parameters:
pickable - If true the object will be pickable.
color - Object intrinsic color. Null for white.
trans - Object transparency (0 - 1). If out of range transparency is disabled.
texPath - The path of the file containing the texture image. Null if none.
min - Minimum extent of the shape.
max - Maximum extent of the shape.
margin - The amount added to all extents.
Method Detail

buildGeometry

public static javax.media.j3d.Geometry buildGeometry(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                                                     javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                                                     double margin)
Builds the geometry for a box outline shape.

Parameters:
min - Minimum extent of the shape.
max - Maximum extent of the shape.
margin - The amount added to all extents.
Returns:
A new shape geometry. Never null.

getShadingModel

public int getShadingModel()
Description copied from class: TextureShape
Gets the shading model, if any, used by this shape in generating its surface normals. If TextureShape.SHADING_NONE, the shape does not support shading. Must be overriden by subclasses.

Specified by:
getShadingModel in class TextureShape
Returns:
Shading model (TextureShape.???).
